response.original_title: Blood Pumpers Racing Club: Monster Fire Baby
response.overview: This is a short edit of the performance that was made to accompany an installation piece for lalapalooza's traveling art tent. Unfortunately it doesn't convey the intensity of the show, which laster for about 15 minutes, or show the bombarding of the standing room only audience of nearly 200 and including being sprayed with various colors of paint as the the monster as the monster sex ritual climaxed. A longer edit and all the original footage were lost, leaving this as the only document.
response.title: Blood Pumpers Racing Club: Monster Fire Baby
